title: New Releases for June 28, 2016
description:
This week, Liberty and Rebecca discuss Chronicle of a Last Summer, All the Missing Girls, We Could Be Beautiful, and more new releases.
This episode was sponsored by ThirdLove and This Calls for a Drink!: The Best Wines and Beers to Pair with Every Situation by Diane McMartin
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
The One-in-a-Million Boy by Monica Wood
Local Girls by Caroline Zancan
All the Missing Girls by Megan Miranda
All the Rage by Courtney Summer
We Could Be Beautiful by Swan Huntley
Chronicle of a Last Summer by Yasmine El Rashidi
Our Souls at Night by Kent Harouf

What we’re reading:
The Amazing Adventures of Kavalier and Clay by Michael Chabon
Lab Girl by Hope Larson
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
